New Records: Dawid Malan scored a career-best 140 in the match
Key Match Events: Reece Topley took 4 wickets, Dawid Malan scored a career-best 140, England bowled out Bangladesh for 227 runs, England won the match by 137 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh won the toss and asked England to bat first, England made one change in their lineup with Reece Topley replacing Moeen Ali
Post-Match Reflections: England captain Jos Buttler expressed pride in the team's performance, Dawid Malan mentioned that the new ball was skidding on, as it went on, it was slowing down and he hoped it would become slower in the second innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Himachal Pradesh Cricket Association Stadium in Dharamsala, England improved their net run rate with the win, Bangladesh's required run rate soared to 13.66 and they were still going at 4.87
